    • LoginControl

      public LoginControl()

  • Method Details

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin(Event ev)
      Action event listener for Login button. Change to Edit page. This method can be called from handleEnter(KeyEvent), hence the parameter is Event-typed
      Parameters:
      ev - Action or key event

    • handleEnter

      public void handleEnter(KeyEvent ev)
      Key event listener for when the enter key is pressed when one text field is focused. Call handleLogin(Event) method
      Parameters:
      ev - Key event

    • setAttributes

      public void setAttributes(Stage stage, ArrayList<Commune> cities)
      Setter for the mainStage attribute. Called from the Results view
      Parameters:
      stage - The main stage
      cities - List of selected cities which will be pass to the Edit view if credentials are correct
